headline: Time Isn’t Just a Clock—It’s a Feeling
body: If time feels unreal, you’re not broken—you’re unlinked. Give time shape. Make it visual. Make it matter.
prompt: What’s one way you could make time feel more real or visible today?

headline: Focus Isn’t Always Control
body: Sometimes your brain locks in to survive. Learn to ride the wave—and come up for air with care.
prompt: What signal tells you you’ve been in hyperfocus too long—and what gentle exit strategy could you use?

headline: You're Not Overreacting—You're Overstimulated
body: Sensory regulation isn’t a luxury. It’s your baseline. Design the world so your brain doesn’t have to fight it.
prompt: What’s one sensory shift—light, sound, texture—you could change to give your brain more ease this week?

headline: You're Not Failing—You're Fried
body: Burnout doesn’t mean you're weak—it means you ran without fuel. You deserve sustainable effort, not survival mode.
prompt: What system, break, or boundary could help future-you avoid another crash this month?
